name: Animals matching memory game for kids
name_original: Animals matching memory game for kids
description:
Play the classic memory match game with Animals.
Click the tiles on the board to reveal the animal hiding. If you reveal two cards consecutively with the same animal, you got a match.
The animals are animated and play a cute animation when matched. They are then moved to a basket to be collected.

Features:
- 10 different difficulty levels, with 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 20, 24, 30, 36 and 42 tiles at the same time
- 69 different animals to choose from
- Animal names are professionally narrated and spoken out loud as you find a match
- A collection page that unlocks automatically as you play
- not timed and no pressure
- no ads in the game board
- A casual relaxing game for all ages
- A setting screen where sound and music can be turned on or off
